contentrichtext.text: '''Dalton''' (named after [[John Dalton]]) is an [[Ab initio quantum chemistry methods|ab initio]] [[quantum chemistry]] computer program. It is capable of calculating various molecular properties using the [[Hartree–Fock]], [[MÃ¸ller–Plesset perturbation theory|MP2]], [[MCSCF]] and [[coupled cluster]] theories. Version 2.0 of DALTON added support for [[density functional theory]] calculations. There are many authors, including [[Trygve Helgaker]] and [[Kenneth Ruud]]. == See also == * [[List of quantum chemistry and solid state physics software|Quantum chemistry software]] * [[Centre for Theoretical and Computational Chemistry]] ==External links== * [http://www.kjemi.uio.no/software/dalton/dalton.html Dalton Homepage] [[Category:Computational chemistry software]] {{theoretical-chem-stub}} {{science-software-stub}}
